title: The Uncommon Thread
description: The Uncommon Thread along with the column Una Voce have been two of the most popular features in the JOURNAL: of the Mississippi State Medical Association in recent years. At one time or the other Dr. Scott Anderson has written them both. His stories are published for the physicians but are loved by spouses, nurses, office workers and patients alike. They cover a gamut of subjects but each shines a light on some aspect of our uncommon lives. Out June 2012 from China Grove Press.
author: R. Scott Anderson
